original: "I am the last necromancer you will ever see."
translation: “我是你见到的最后一个亡灵巫师。”

original: "I am the supreme and solitary necromancer!"
translation: “我是至高无上的孤独的亡灵法师！”

original: "I do not mind failure. You ARE dead after all."
translation: “我不介意失败。毕竟你已经死了。”

original: "I'm not supposed to be complete, just elegant."
"Let the curtain rise and the dead dance."
"Now it is time to show you how it is done."
translation: “现在是时候告诉你怎么做了。”

original: "Oh, those of girls are disgusting people!"
"Welcome to the story of the miniature garden."
"What is that ringing bell? I wish it would stop."
translation: “那是什么铃声？我希望它能停止。”

original: A big hole opened in your face as you looked in the mirror ... .... Ah, it was just a dream.
translation: 当你照镜子时，脸上开了一个大洞。。。。啊，那只是个梦。

original: A brutal weapon that is basically a metal ball attached to a chain. Not only it is capable of dealing crushing blows, it can be used to entangle enemies.
translation: 一种残暴的武器，基本上是一个金属球连在链子上。它不仅能造成毁灭性的打击，还可以用来缠住敌人。

original: A brutal weapon that is basically a saw-blade attached to a chain. Its sharpness and long length allows swift decapitation.
translation: 一种残暴的武器，基本上是一把锯片连在链子上。它的锋利和长允许迅速斩首。

original: A coffin with a long chain connected to it. Unwieldy to wear, but offers a huge space for your items. It also doubles as a shield on your back.
translation: 有长链子的棺材。穿着不便，但为您的物品提供了巨大的空间。它也可以作为你背上的盾牌。

original: A combat lawnmower that has been activated. Its spinning blades will slice through anything in its way.
translation: 已经启动的战斗割草机。它旋转的叶片会划破任何阻碍它前进的东西。

original: A complete guide to Kung Fu.
A cute stuffed toy attached to your body. Offers no support other than morale.
translation: 一个可爱的毛绒玩具附在你身上。除了士气，没有其他支持。

original: A gothic lolita dress made practical with kevlar and pockets. The skirt allows a medium-sized firearm to be holstered. It is a bit stuffy in the chest area, however.
translation: 一件哥特式洛丽塔连衣裙，用凯夫拉和口袋做成。这条裙子可以装一支中等大小的火器。不过，胸部有点闷。

original: A home-made shotgun made from four double-barrel shotguns joined together. It has eight times the power of a pipe shotgun. Legend says that the first person to craft this was inspired by a certain movie about the undead.
translation: 四把双管猎枪连在一起制成的自制猎枪。它的威力是管猎枪的八倍。传说第一个制作这个的人是受到一部关于不死族的电影的启发。

original: A huge pair of scissors for battle. It is difficult to walk around with, but its ruggedness and overwhelming cutting force are attractive.
translation: 一把用于战斗的大剪刀。这是很难走动，但它的坚固性和压倒性的切削力是有吸引力的。

original: A lacy headdress meant to be worn with the dress. It attracts attention.
translation: 花边头饰一种花边头饰，与裙子一起戴。它引起了人们的注意。

original: A massively oversized knife. It is not very good at delicate works, but its primary function is second to none.
translation: 一把超大的刀。它不擅长精致的作品，但它的主要功能却是首屈一指的。

original: A membrane of deadly flesh, the wing of the fallen angel. Although you can not fly, a wing protects your body from attacks.
translation: 一层致命的肉，堕落天使的翅膀。虽然你不能飞，但翅膀可以保护你的身体免受攻击。

original: A metal trunk. Not to mention storage, because it is sturdy it becomes a shield substitute. You can use it as a weapon that swings around by taking advantage of its weight.
translation: 一个金属箱子。更不用说存储，因为它是坚固的，它成为一个盾牌替代品。你可以用它作为武器，利用它的重量来摆动。

original: A modified lawn mower used to mow down zombies. When turning on the switch, its blades start spinning waiting for their victims.
translation: 用来修剪丧尸的改良割草机。当打开开关时，它的叶片开始旋转等待受害者。

original: A new eye came out of your body. The field of view broadens, but the appearance is disgusting. Perception + 2
translation: 一只新的眼睛从你身体里出来。视野变宽了，但外表很恶心。感知+2

original: A small cute cloth ribbon. There is no defensive power, but may heal you in this ruined world.
translation: 一条可爱的小布带。没有防御的力量，但可以治愈你在这个毁灭的世界。

original: A small sword with a popping mechanism stored inside the glove. It was able to store and deploy instantaneously, and it was heavily used to assassinate key people.
translation: 手套里装有弹跳装置的小剑。它能够瞬间存储和部署，大量用于暗杀关键人物。

original: A super-concentrated mutagen that resembles a liquified corpse. You need a syringe to inject it...  if you really want to?
translation: 一种超浓缩的诱变剂，类似于液化的尸体。你需要一个注射器来注射。。。如果你真的想？

original: A thin, surprisingly sharp wire. It is used as a very sharp garrote capable of dismembering enemies precisely.
translation: 细而锋利的金属丝。它被用作非常锋利的绞喉，能够精确地肢解敌人。

original: An impractically lacy dress from the Gothic Lolita subculture. Despite all the laces, it is surprisingly easy to move in.
translation: 哥特式洛丽塔亚文化中不切实际的花边连衣裙。尽管有这么多的鞋带，但它还是很容易搬进去。

original: An improved version of the katana. Inscription is carved with a sword that was forged by high technology.
translation: 武士刀的改良版。碑文上刻着一把用高科技锻造的剑。

original: An underskirt meant to be worn under a dress. It keeps the skirt puffy by way of wires.
translation: 穿在裙子下面的衬裙。它通过电线使裙子保持蓬松。

original: Dummy item.  If you see this, then something went wrong.
translation: 虚拟项目。如果你看到这个，那就出问题了。

original: Eating rotting, long-dead flesh is good for the struggle, and safe--if still completely unappealing--for you.
translation: 吃腐烂的、长时间的死肉对斗争是有益的，而且对你来说是安全的——如果仍然完全没有吸引力的话。

original: Embed the deformation mechanism from the wrist to the drill head. It consumes electric power and starts high-speed rotation. You can excavate both the ground and zombies.
translation: 将变形机构从手腕嵌入钻头。它消耗电力并开始高速旋转。你可以挖掘地面和丧尸。

original: Embed the mechanism that generates the light blade in the arm. It becomes a powerful weapon by starting as necessary.
translation: 将产生光刃的机制嵌入手臂。必要时启动，它就成为一种强大的武器。

original: For your whole life you've been forbidden from indulging in your peculiar tastes.  Now the world's ended, and you'll be damned if anyone is going to tell you that you can't eat people.
translation: 你一辈子都被禁止沉迷于自己的独特品味。现在世界末日了，如果有人告诉你不能吃人，你会被诅咒的。

original: Has the appearance of a girl, but it is swinging a knife with obvious superhuman speed and strength. There is no doubt that it is reinforced with blaspheming techniques.
translation: 有一个女孩的外表，但它挥舞着一把明显超人的速度和力量的刀。毫无疑问，这是加强了亵渎技巧。

original: I woke up from a dream where I was packing my own torn-out intenstines back into my body. Maybe I should stop packing weird things into myself.
translation: 我从一个梦中醒来，在梦中我正在把自己撕开的肠子装回我的身体。也许我应该停止把奇怪的东西塞进我自己。

original: In your dream, you were reconnecting your dismembered arms.
translation: 在你的梦里，你正在重新连接你被肢解的手臂。

original: In your dream, you were spoken to by an unknown person who is right next to you. When you turn you notice their head is connected to your body.
translation: 在你的梦中，你被一个不认识的人和你说话，他就在你旁边。当你转身时，你注意到他们的头与你的身体相连。

original: In your dream, your body got cut, but you didn't consider it a problem.
translation: 在你的梦里，你的身体被割伤了，但你不认为这是个问题。

original: It looks like a beautiful girl, but is actually the queen of the undead who leads countless undead.
translation: 它看起来像一个美丽的女孩，但实际上是领导无数不死族的不死族女王。

original: It looks like a beautiful girl, but is really...?
translation: 它看起来像一个漂亮的女孩，但真的是。。。？

original: It looks like a human being, but the limbs are cut, and instead there is a monster with things like hooks attached. Seems to have high regenerative power, but as there is no eyes it has no vision
translation: 它看起来像一个人，但是四肢被割开了，取而代之的是一个怪物，上面连着钩之类的东西。似乎有很高的再生能力，但因为没有眼睛它就没有视力

original: It was mostly horrible machine remodeling that kept the prototype of the human body intact. It has no legs and is floating with something like a floater.
translation: 主要是可怕的机器改造使人体原型保持完整。它没有腿，像漂浮物一样漂浮着。

original: Kung Fu is a kind of martial art, but it is also means - Skill achieved through hard work - in traditional Chinese. It is characterized by hard striking and flexible body handling, it is good at knocking your opponent off their feet.
translation: 功夫是一种武术，但在中国传统文化中，它也是一种手段——通过努力获得的技能。它的特点是硬打击和灵活的身体处理，它是在击倒你的对手的脚好。

original: Large protuberances are growing from your body. It will be enough to pierce and hook at close range.
translation: 巨大的突起从你的身体上长出来。近距离刺穿和钩住就足够了。

original: MODIFIED by YukariMindGap from Malkeus: Add items, mutations and enemies appearing in Nechronica: the Long Long Sequel.
translation: 修改由YukariMindGap从Malkeus：增加项目，突变和敌人出现在Nechronica：长期续集。

original: Most animals don't like you, and aggressive animals are more likely to attack you.  This only applies to natural animals such as woodland creatures.
translation: 大多数动物都不喜欢你，有攻击性的动物更容易攻击你。这只适用于森林生物等自然动物。

original: Nothing hurts any more.  Those bites tickle and the wounds itch a bit, but that's it.
translation: 再也没有什么痛了。那些咬伤让人发痒，伤口也有点痒，但仅此而已。

original: Originally it looked like a girl, but now her ego collapsed she's gone mad.
translation: 原来它看起来像个女孩，但现在她的自我崩溃了，她疯了。

original: Sunlight makes you very uncomfortable.  If you are outdoors during the day, you suffer -1 to all stats; -2 if the weather is Sunny.
translation: 阳光使你很不舒服。如果你白天在户外，你会受到-1的伤害；如果天气晴朗，你会受到-2的伤害。

original: The collapsed body is broken and patchy. Even if it breaks, you can simply reattach the parts.
translation: 倒塌的尸体是破碎的，斑驳的。即使它坏了，你也可以简单地重新连接零件。

original: The metallic stake stored in the forearm shoots with high vibration and super high speed. Although you need to approach to close range, that power is guaranteed. Of course, it also consumes electricity.
translation: 储存在前臂的金属桩以高振动和超高速射击。虽然你需要接近近距离，但这种力量是有保证的。当然，它也消耗电力。

original: There is a big hole in your body. However, there is no hindrance to battle, and the person who saw it is a little surprised.
translation: 你身上有个大洞。然而，战斗没有阻碍，看到它的人有点吃惊。

original: There is another head on your shoulders. And here you thought you were doing well with just one. You can not see the other side of the face directly, but you can understand what you see over there. Intelligence + 5, Perception + 3
translation: 你肩上还有一个头。在这里，你觉得你只有一个很好。你不能直接看到脸的另一面，但你可以理解你在那里看到的东西。智力+5，感知+3

original: This is a lightsaber. KWISHUUUU KWISHUUUU.
This sheets of paper dated 10 days before all this started-describes a complex chemical formula and a diagram to embed something like slime mold in humans...
translation: 这张写在这一切开始前10天的纸描述了一个复杂的化学公式和一个图表，在人类身上嵌入了类似粘菌的东西。。。

original: This transforms your wrist in to a drill head. You will be able to make a hole in everything.
translation: 这会把你的手腕变成钻头。你可以在任何东西上打洞。

original: Using footwork you can always turn to attack and avoid. Bonus to hit and avoid
translation: 用步法你总是可以转身攻击和躲避。击中并避免的奖励

original: You are a doll, a result of occult reanimation on human corpses. A tough combatant able to take on the biggest of threats in close combat.
translation: 你是一个玩偶，是人类尸体神秘复活的结果。能在近距离战斗中承担最大威胁的强悍战士。

original: You are a doll, a result of occult reanimation on human corpses. You are the most basic of the dolls, but comes equipped with useful skills and utilities.
translation: 你是一个玩偶，是人类尸体神秘复活的结果。你是最基本的娃娃，但配备了有用的技能和实用工具。

original: You are a doll, a result of occult reanimation on human corpses. You have the skills to utilize explosives and a proper discipline on its usage.
translation: 你是一个玩偶，是人类尸体神秘复活的结果。你有使用炸药的技能和使用炸药的纪律。

original: You are a doll, a result of occult reanimation on human corpses. You were designed to hunt down the other undead and devour them.
translation: 你是一个玩偶，是人类尸体神秘复活的结果。你被设计来猎杀其他不死生物并吞噬它们。

original: You are a doll, a result of occult reanimation on human corpses. Your genetics shifts uncontrollably, but you can utilize it to your advantage
translation: 你是一个玩偶，是人类尸体神秘复活的结果。你的基因无法控制地改变，但你可以利用它对你有利

original: You are a doll, a result of occult reanimation on human corpses. Your graceful dancing has no equals.
translation: 你是一个玩偶，是人类尸体神秘复活的结果。你优美的舞蹈无与伦比。

original: You are a doll, a result of occult reanimation on human corpses. Your previous experience with firearms came handy in your now-undeath.
translation: 你是一个玩偶，是人类尸体神秘复活的结果。你以前在枪械方面的经验对你现在的不死派上了用场。

original: You blow away %s with Iron Mine.
You can conveniently change your body. Although it will be slightly weaker against attacks, the overall encumbrance is relaxed considerably.
translation: 你可以方便地改变你的身体。尽管它对攻击的抵抗力会稍微弱一些，但总体负担会大大减轻。

original: You consume three times as much food as the average human to maintain your truly superhuman endurance.
translation: 你消耗的食物是普通人的三倍，以保持你真正超人的耐力。

original: You had a dream where something was wriggling inside your body.
translation: 你做了一个梦，梦里有东西在你体内蠕动。

original: You had a terrifying dream where someone was doing a transplant on something not human.
translation: 你做了一个可怕的梦，有人在做一个非人类的移植手术。

original: You had such a strange and crisp dream, that you were embracing your own head.
translation: 你做了一个奇怪而清脆的梦，你抱着自己的头。

original: You have a hard time falling asleep, even under the best circumstances!
translation: 即使在最好的情况下，你也很难入睡！

original: You have a high tolerance for pain.
translation: 你对疼痛有很强的忍耐力。

original: You have a long, thick, lizardlike tail.  It helps you balance a bit but also makes a serviceable whip.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
translation: 你的尾巴又长又粗，像蜥蜴。它有助于你平衡一点，但也使一个有用的鞭子。防止穿非织物裤子。

original: You have a major digestive disorder.  Though it causes you to vomit frequently, you have found that you can trigger your vomit reflex on demand, too.
translation: 你有严重的消化障碍。虽然它会导致你经常呕吐，但你发现你也可以根据需要触发呕吐反射。

original: You have a pair of bumps on your skull.
translation: 你的头骨上有一对肿块。

original: You have a pair of stubby little wings projecting from your shoulderblades.  They can be wiggled at will, but are useless.
translation: 你的肩胛骨上有一对短而短的小翅膀。它们可以随意摆动，但毫无用处。

original: You have claws on the ends of your fingers.  If you aren't wearing gloves, your unarmed attacks deal a minor amount of cutting damage.
translation: 你的手指头上有爪子。如果你没有戴手套，你的徒手攻击会造成轻微的切割伤害。

original: You need about twice as much food as the average human to maintain your expanded cardiovascular and respiratory systems.  On a plus side, it doesn't take you much time to recover from any strenuous activity.
translation: 你需要比普通人多一倍的食物来维持你扩张的心血管和呼吸系统。从好的方面来说，你不用花太多时间就可以从剧烈运动中恢复过来。

original: You no longer have just two arms. There are additional arms on your shoulder. It is hard to master, but you may expand your range of tactics. Dex + 2
translation: 你不再只有两只胳膊了。你肩上还有额外的手臂。这很难掌握，但你可以扩大你的战术范围。指数+2

original: You now have more than two legs. Another pair of legs are growing from your waist. You will not be able to equip usual leg protection, but you can move fast.
translation: 你现在有两条腿了。另一双腿从你的腰部长出来。你将无法装备通常的护腿装备，但你可以快速移动。

original: You recover from pain faster than normal.
translation: 你从疼痛中恢复得比平常快。

original: You recover from pain much faster than normal.
translation: 你从疼痛中恢复得比平常快得多。

original: You recover from pain slightly faster than normal.
translation: 你从疼痛中恢复的速度比平常稍快。

original: You smell awful.  Monsters that track scent will find you very easily, and humans will react poorly.
translation: 你闻起来很难闻。追踪气味的怪物会很容易找到你，而人类的反应会很差。

original: You stand and become vigilant against attacks *
translation: 你站起来，对攻击保持警惕*

original: Your arms and legs come off and attack the opponent. Since they return automatically after the attack, you do not have to worry about removing it.
translation: 你的胳膊和腿脱下来攻击对手。因为它们在攻击后会自动返回，所以您不必担心移除它。

original: Your body has developed a wonderful defense mechanism.  Instead of normal blood, you bleed a strong molecular acid which will damage any creature foolish enough to harm you.
translation: 你的身体已经形成了一种奇妙的防御机制。而不是正常的血液，你流血一个强大的分子酸，这将损害任何生物愚蠢到伤害你。

original: Your body is a young girl, but you also have male features. Although it is rare, it will not be useful any longer.
translation: 你的身体是一个年轻的女孩，但你也有男性特征。虽然它很罕见，但它将不再有用了。

original: Your body is coated with a fine slime.  Protects from long term effects of acid, though not short term ones.  Greatly increases wet benefits.
translation: 你的身体上覆盖着一层细密的黏液。保护免受酸的长期影响，但不是短期影响。大大增加了湿的好处。

original: Your body is coming apart at its seams. You become even more encumbered and frail.
translation: 你的身体正在裂开。你变得更加累赘和虚弱。

original: Your body starts breaking apart. You become more encumbered and frail.
translation: 你的身体开始分裂。你变得更加累赘和虚弱。

original: Your extremities are covered in painful sores.  The pain is worse when they are covered in clothing.
translation: 你的四肢长满了疼痛的疮。当他们被衣服覆盖时疼痛更严重。

original: Your feel that all your pain is gone for a moment.
translation: 你觉得你所有的痛苦都消失了。

original: Your fingernails are long and sharp.  If you aren't wearing gloves, your unarmed attacks deal a minor amount of cutting damage.
translation: 你的指甲又长又尖。如果你没有戴手套，你的徒手攻击会造成轻微的切割伤害。

original: Your flesh regenerates from wounds incredibly quickly.
translation: 你的肌肉从伤口中迅速再生。

original: Your guts have developed the ability to handle poisonous food.  Mostly.
translation: 你的肠子已经发展出处理有毒食物的能力。基本上。

original: Your heart slows down for a beat.
Your mutated flesh is immune to the damaging effects of acid.
translation: 你变异的肌肉对酸的破坏作用免疫。

original: Your tongue has become long and tubular. Not particularly effective.
translation: 你的舌头变得又长又管状。不是特别有效。

original: Your tongue is dripping with drool. You can not equip anything on your mouth, but they will be surprised when you attack them with your tongue.
translation: 你的舌头流着口水。你不能在嘴上装备任何东西，但当你用舌头攻击他们时，他们会感到惊讶。
幸存者哥特式洛丽塔连衣裙
